messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Turn on suit sensors to full. we have 1 MIA, we dont need 2.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I HAVE ENTERED BATTLE MODE! YOU WANNA KILL ME!? COME ON! I will also assist sec

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

Nanotrasen Superweapons Division is testing a new prototype field cruiser, some mild debris is expected.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Crew, this has been the best shift i ever had! although it was boring, atleast nuke ops didn`t break in and let space carp in and then we all die!
